UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information and role.

bio.description: A short biography for the user.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

DoorCode.title: DoorCode
DoorCode.description: Represents a door code for a specific property.

location.description: The physical location of the door (e.g., 'Front Door', 'Garage').

code.description: The primary code for the lock.

adminProgrammingCode.description: The admin or programming code for the lock.

guestCode.description: The guest code for the lock.

doorLockType.description: The name of the door lock type.

property.description: The property the door code belongs to.

lastChanged.description: The date and time the door code was last changed.

LockType.title: LockType
LockType.description: Represents a single door lock type with instructions.

id.description: A unique identifier for the lock type.

name.description: The name of the door lock type.

instructionImageUrl.description: A URL to an image of the instruction sheet.

LockTypesConfiguration.title: LockTypesConfiguration
LockTypesConfiguration.description: A list of available door lock types for the platform.

types.description: An array of door lock type objects.

Property.title: Property
Property.description: Represents a single property with its details.

address.description: The full address of the property.

mortgage.description: The monthly mortgage payment for the property.

averageExpensePerTenant.description: An estimated average monthly expense per tenant for this property.

active.description: Whether the property is currently active.

Tenant.title: Tenant
Tenant.description: Represents a single tenant with their contact details and property assignment.

name.description: The full name of the tenant.

property.description: The property the tenant is residing in.

room.description: The room number or identifier for the tenant.

rent.description: The monthly rent amount for the tenant.

deposit.description: The security deposit amount paid by the tenant.

active.description: Whether the tenant is currently active.

date.description: The date the expense was incurred.

amount.description: The monetary value of the expense.

description.description: A detailed description of the expense.

vendor.description: The vendor or supplier for the expense.

property.description: The property associated with the expense, if any.

room.description: The specific room associated with the expense, if any.

receiptUrl.description: URL of the uploaded receipt image.

ExpenseCategory.title: ExpenseCategory
ExpenseCategory.description: Represents a single category for expenses.

id.description: A unique identifier for the category.

name.description: The name of the expense category.

ExpenseCategoriesConfiguration.title: ExpenseCategoriesConfiguration
ExpenseCategoriesConfiguration.description: A list of available expense categories.

categories.description: An array of expense category objects.

Vendor.title: Vendor
Vendor.description: Represents a single vendor or supplier.

id.description: A unique identifier for the vendor.

RentPayment.title: RentPayment
RentPayment.description: Represents a single rent payment made by a tenant.

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant who made the payment.

tenantName.description: The name of the tenant for display purposes.

property.description: The property for which rent was paid.

date.description: The date the rent payment was received.

amount.description: The monetary value of the payment.

IncomeType.title: IncomeType
IncomeType.description: Represents a single category for income.

id.description: A unique identifier for the income type.

name.description: The name of the income type (e.g., Rent, Late Fee).

IncomeTypesConfiguration.title: IncomeTypesConfiguration
IncomeTypesConfiguration.description: A list of available income types.

types.description: An array of income type objects.

id.description: A unique identifier for the payment method.

name.description: The name of the payment method (e.g., Zelle, Cash).

PaymentMethodsConfiguration.title: PaymentMethodsConfiguration
PaymentMethodsConfiguration.description: A list of available payment methods.

methods.description: An array of payment method objects.

collections.description: Stores the public profile for a user, including their role.
Stores door codes for a specific user.
Stores the list of available door lock types with their instructions.
Stores the list of available expense categories.
Stores the list of available vendors.
Stores the list of available income types.
Stores the list of available payment methods.
Stores the detailed profile for each property.
